caption.title: Map of Kenya showing mosquito sampling sites.
caption.p: The map was designed using ArcMap 10.2.2. with the ocean and lakes base layer derived from Natural Earth ( http://www.naturalearthdata.com/, a free GIS data source). The sample points were collected using a GPS gadget (garmin etrex 20, https://buy.garmin.com/en-US/US/p/518046), and the county boundaries for Kenya derived from AfricaOpendata ( https://africaopendata.org/dataset/kenya-counties-shapefile, license Creative Commons).
